
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/Can-daydayup/p/18859538" title="发布于 2025-05-04 21:41">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">一个包含 80+ C#/.NET 编程技巧实战练习开源项目！</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>项目介绍</span></h2>
<p data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>C#/.NET/.NET Core编程常用语法、算法、技巧、中间件、类库、工作业务实操练习集，配套详细的文章教程讲解，助你快速掌握C#/.NET/.NET Core中各种编程常用语法、算法、技巧、中间件、类库、工作业务实操等等。</span></p>
<ul class="list-paddingleft-1">
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzIxMTUzNzM5Ng==&amp;mid=2247512129&amp;idx=1&amp;sn=c16e5aaac9bf721b7317e43128467b6d&amp;scene=21#wechat_redirect" target="_blank" data-linktype="2" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#/.NET/.NET Core全面的学习、工作、面试指南知识库！</span></a></span></li>
<li><span>开源地址：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetExercises" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span class="wx_text_underline" style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetExercises</span></a></span></span></li>
<li>想要学习C#/.NET/.NET Core什么技术欢迎Issues中留言：<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/issues/42" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/issues/42</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1336199/202505/1336199-20250504213843151-1499028294.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span>文章详细教程</span></h2>
<ul dir="auto">

<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/RZpAuht7yNLdG4Nb6TGinw" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">42、C#经典十大排序算法</span></a></span>

<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/V1fDK4cs_j_igsIrKcPHZg" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">80、C# 中比较实用的关键字，基础高频面试题！</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/avLIWx6tmS5DLokzLLfurw" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">81、一个开源、经典的 WPF 控件、组件和实用工具集合，值得参考学习！</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/EasySQLite" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">82、EasySQLite</span></a>：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/6aKoDIle7nMr2aflMvhdmw" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">七天.NET 8操作SQLite入门到实战详细教程（选型、开发、发布、部署）</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/EasySQLite" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">83、EasySQLite</span></a>：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/EN5fu-RvBK-xX8lJMZ5QvA" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">将 EasySQLite 从 .NET 8 升级到 .NET 9</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/EasySQLite" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">84、EasySQLite</span></a>：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/oYYqRa_1Bwn65SdcPWelSQ" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">在 .NET 9 中使用 Scalar 替代 Swagger</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/DotNetGuidePractice/HelloDotNetGuide/CSharp%E8%AF%AD%E6%B3%95/DictionaryExercise.cs" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">85、DictionaryExercise</span></a>：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/PIzbV1gxz3L9JR8-vsB4ow" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C#之 Dictionary 详解</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetExercises/blob/master/BenchmarkDotNetExercise/ParamsBenchmark.cs" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">86、ParamsBenchmark</span></a>：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/RNxL8YX_BEFDb3qcJzXjqA" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">浅谈 C# 13 中的 params 集合</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/DotNetGuidePractice/HelloDotNetGuide/CSharp%E8%AF%AD%E6%B3%95/CSharp13GrammarExercise.cs" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">87、CSharp13GrammarExercise</span></a>：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/s6FXo-8pL2I3l8EDH4-ZiA" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C# 13 中的新增功能实操</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/DotNetGuide/blob/main/DotNetGuidePractice/HelloDotNetGuide/CSharp%E8%AF%AD%E6%B3%95/LinqExercise.cs" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">88、LinqExercise</span></a>：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/dYJLNMqaGGO9tLdODot9vg" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">C# LINQ 快速入门实战指南，建议收藏学习！</span></a></span></li>
<li><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)"><a href="https://github.com/YSGStudyHards/EFCoreExercise/blob/main/Service/AdvancedQuery.cs" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">89、EFCoreExercise</span></a>：<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/gi35WPRGI5uHmaeAwK_MJQ" rel="noopener nofollow"><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">EF Core 10 现已支持 LeftJoin 和 RightJoin 运算符查询了！</span></a></span></li>
</ul>
</div>
